activities:
Ethical Advocate provides a 24/7/365, anonymous and confidential incident reporting service to its clients, that allows the client’s employees and other stakeholders to communicate concerns affecting the organization’s well-being through toll-free telephone hotlines and web-based reporting. 
In addition Ethical Advocate’s service provides highly effective tools to manage the reports including immediate email notification to authorized client representatives, extensive case management and statistical analysis for clients to examine their risk exposures as reflected through the submitted reports.

Ethical Advocate also provides online trainings in scores of topics and live ethics trainings/seminars for leadership and management of organizations and agencies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: Commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives.
